scripts.minify:js: terser assets/js/script.js -o assets/js/script.min.js -c -m && terser assets/js/gallery.js -o assets/js/gallery.min.js -c -m && terser assets/js/hampers.js -o assets/js/hampers.min.js -c -m && terser assets/js/preloader.js -o assets/js/preloader.min.js -c -m && terser assets/js/reservation.js -o assets/js/reservation.min.js -c -m && terser assets/js/swc-carousel.js -o assets/js/swc-carousel.min.js -c -m && terser assets/js/tapas.js -o assets/js/tapas.min.js -c -m && terser assets/js/utils.js -o assets/js/utils.min.js -c -m && terser assets/js/wines.js -o assets/js/wines.min.js -c -m && terser sw.js -o sw.min.js -c -m
scripts.minify:all: npm run build:css && npm run build:css:faq && npm run minify:js
